content:
I apologize for any frustration or disappointment my responses may have caused. As an AI language model, my access to specific information about Supermarine's post-purchase customer support strategy is limited. However, I tried to provide general best practices that companies can follow to enhance their post-purchase customer support, as well as suggestions for ways to find more specific information about Supermarine's approach. 

If you have any specific questions, I'll do my best to answer them based on the information available to me. Please let me know if there is anything else I can assist you with.
